sense.name: pervade
sense.examples: Those hybrid sandal boots imbue everything in your wardrobe with chic. We imbue words with vitality. They imbue work ethic through the organization. It's a unique way to imbue history and character into any structure. Human actors are able to engage and imbue it with meaning. It imbues it with a significance. He had the faith neceaasry to imbue illusion with a magical quality. Poets imbue language with a new meaning.

sense.name: infuse with color
sense.examples: Siderophones imbue secretors with a green tinge, as opposed to white. The three counter rotating wheels imbue color into the hair strands. 658.3-nm line can imbue more color contrasts in the planetary images.
